CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 8, 1966, pg. 4B reads: "Slimnastics Class At Homewood YMCA - Getting in shape of the Fall Fashion Show are members of the Slimnastics Charm Class of the Homewood-Brus[h]ton YMCA. Women may sign up now for the new class to begin Oct. 6 by contacting the Homewood-Brushton YMCA at 731-1636.  Mrs. Alfred Tyson is the instructor.  The ladies will present a fashion show on Sunday, Nov. 13 at 4 P.M.  Left to right :Doris Hall, Charlotte Staples, Marie Jeanne' Brown, Doris Jeter, Alfreda Tyson, Instructor.  Second row: Nettie Myers, Leatha Lewis, Rosemarie Stewart, Sandra Black.  Third row; Rose Marie Sanders, Gwendolyn Barnes, Lucille Tucker, Larraine Nance, and Donald Allen. (Harris photo)."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the Slimnastics Charm Class, from left, first row: Doris Hall, Charlotte Staples, Marie Jeanne Brown, Doris Jeter, and Alfreda Tyson; second row: Nettie Myers, Leatha Lewis, Rosemarie Stewart, and Sandra Black; third row; Rose Marie Sanders, Gwendolyn Barnes, Lucille Tucker, Larraine Nance, and Donald Allen, posed on outdoor basketball court of Homewood YMCA
